doc.name: RExpression
doc.description: The RExpression actor is an actor designed to run an R script or function with inputs and outputs determined by the ports created by the user. Port names will correspond to R object names. The RExpression actor is modeled after the Ptolemy expression actor, except that that instead of using a single mathematical expression in Ptolemy's expression language, it uses a set of the more powerful, higher order expressions available under R. Both input and output port will usually be added to the actor; The names of these ports correspond to R variables used in the R script.
doc.author: Dan Higgins, NCEAS, UC Santa Barbara
